Class BitSetMatrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.numenta.nupic.util.AbstractFlatMatrix<java.lang.Boolean>

    public class BitSetMatrix
extends AbstractFlatMatrix<java.lang.Boolean>
implements Persistable
    FlatMatrix implementation that store booleans in a BitSet.
